sentences.en: Anyway, nowadays, reading the newspapers have become a mentally draining chore.
sentences.cn: 但是, 现在读报纸已经变成一种苦差事了.

sentences.en: But a wide - open floor adds only a few seconds the vacuuming chore.
sentences.cn: 但是,广泛的开放式购买只有几秒钟的吸尘苦差事.

sentences.en: Disliking this chore and relieved that it would end soon, he continued fielding questions.
sentences.cn: 他一边暗自庆幸这件讨厌的差事快完了, 一边继续回答问题.

sentences.en: everyday chores like shopping and housework
sentences.cn: 购物和做家务之类的日常琐事

sentences.en: Fortunately, the chore of leaf sweeping is well worth the effort.
sentences.cn: 幸运的是，干清扫落叶这个活儿是值得的。

sentences.en: He is prepared to make a living by accepting any remunerative chore.
sentences.cn: 为了生计,他准备接受任何有酬报的杂活.

sentences.en: His headache has affected his ability to do household chore.
sentences.cn: 里满说《他的头痛已经影响他做一些家务事》.

sentences.en: I find driving a real chore.
sentences.cn: 我觉得开车是一件很讨厌的事情。

sentences.en: It was a methodical, unexciting chore.
sentences.cn: 那是一份按部就班、枯燥乏味的无聊差事。

sentences.en: It's such a chore to change diapers.
sentences.cn: 换尿布真是一件讨厌的事.

sentences.en: It's such a chore to do the shopping every day!
sentences.cn: 每天上街买东西真烦人!

sentences.en: Making pasta by hand with a rolling pin can be a real chore.
sentences.cn: 用擀面杖擀意大利面会是个非常枯燥乏味的活儿。

sentences.en: Peeling bags of potatoes is really a chore.
sentences.cn: 削一袋又一袋洋芋皮真是苦差使.

sentences.en: Reading should be a joy and not a chore.
sentences.cn: 阅读应是一种享受,不是一件苦差.

sentences.en: She sees exercise primarily as an unavoidable chore.
sentences.cn: 她基本上把锻炼看做是不得不做的琐事。

sentences.en: She thought It'such a chore to do the shopping every day!
sentences.cn: 她认为每天上街买东西真烦人!

sentences.en: The ritual will ease the transition to the unwelcome chore.
sentences.cn: 这套规律可以使你易于过渡到你不喜欢的工作上去.

trans.tran_cn: 琐事，令人厌烦的任务，家务活
trans.tran_en: a small job that you have to do regularly, especially work that you do to keep a house clean
